casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Involuntary Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of: A.B. (Minor Child)
and
A.S. (Father), Appellant-Respondent,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-JT-1786 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED January 3, 2019

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BAILEY , J.

Affirmed.

BRADFORD, J., Concurs.

BROWN, J., Concurs.
